trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SEQ_00<tab>Loashkana is anxiously awaiting word from Costa del Sol.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SEQ_01<tab>Mere moments after greeting Loashkana, a messenger from Costa del Sol rushes in with an urgent report: the Unbound have infiltrated Brayflox's Longstop with their small army of mammets, and the goblin is in desperate need of assistance. With little time to waste, the two of you hasten to Raincatcher Gully.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SEQ_02<tab>A panicked Brayflox claims that Ellerete and Kokonowa mean to target Mudstop Watergush─one of the main sources of freshwater on Vylbrand─and Loashkana is keen to give chase as soon as possible. Once your preparations are complete, she bids you speak with her to commence the battle for the Longstop.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SEQ_03<tab>In the depths of the Longstop do you find Ellerete and Kokonowa preparing to enact their wicked plan. Before the miscreants succeed, you must make haste and reclaim the Heartsting with Loashkana.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SEQ_04<tab>Though the poisons were potent and the mammets merciless, you and Loashkana emerge victorious in the battle with Ellerete and Kokonowa, and the Unbound thieves are blasted away in a convenient gobbiebomb-related accident. With her people's heirloom safely in hand, Loashkana eagerly looks in your direction, hoping to express her thanks for your efforts in the battle.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SEQ_05<tab>Brayflox's home is freed from its Unbound influence, and the goblin joyfully conveys her gratitude to you and Loashkana. Though the Heartsting is safe once more, Loashkana is well aware that her sojourn in Eorzea shall soon come to an end, and she wishes to say her farewells to Wyssulm and Zerig.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SEQ_06<tab>As Wyssulm and Zerig reflect on their adventure with Loashkana, the two resolve to grow stronger, that they might one day cross the western seas and reunite in Tural. Her final tasks in Eorzea ended, Loashkana sets her sights back home, and requests your presence at Xbalyav Ty'e to report your shared success to Nyipine.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SEQ_07<tab>Loashkana has much on her mind as she contemplates her time in Eorzea. She has witnessed new possibilities for the Heartsting─both helpful and harmful─and informs Nyipine that their people must explore new avenues of poison resistance should the heirloom ever fall into the wrong hands again. Before that discussion can truly begin, however, the journey home must take precedence, and with a final good-bye, Loashkana expresses her gratitude for the peace you have returned to her people.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Loashkana at Raincatcher Gully.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Loashkana.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Loashkana.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Loashkana again.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Wyssulm in Aleport.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Nyipine in Tuliyollal.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_001<tab>Hello there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I've been on the lookout for anyone from Costa del Sol, but...nothing yet.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_002<tab>Perhaps we should travel over there ourselves, just in case─
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SERVANT04829_000_003<tab>(-???-)<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Mistress Loashkana!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SERVANT04829_000_004<tab>Forgive me the sudden entrance, but I bring a message from Master Gegeruju. Your quarry has been sighted in eastern La Noscea.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_005<tab>Oh! Well, I'm glad I didn't leave early...
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_006<tab>Thank you for bringing word! Where in eastern La Noscea were they last seen?
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SERVANT04829_000_007<tab>Master Wheiskaet but recently received a report from Mistress Brayflox─a trusted associate of his.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SERVANT04829_000_008<tab>We're told a number of “inbreakers with fightytools and tinkerdolls” infiltrated her Longstop.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SERVANT04829_000_009<tab>We have little doubt the “inbreakers and tinkerdolls” she speaks of are Ellerete and her troupe.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_010<tab>I see... Then we'd best find this Brayflox, and soon.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_SERVANT04829_000_011<tab>Indeed. You're like to find her by the entrance to her Longstop in Raincatcher Gully. My master and his associates wish you good hunting.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_100_011<tab>We should get a firsthand account from Brayflox, as well─perhaps she'll have more to tell. Let's be off, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_BRAYFLOX_000_016<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Uplander gobbiefriend returns to Longstop!

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_012<tab>So this is Brayflox! I told her she reminded me of a Moblin, but I got a bit of a scolding for that... “Not Mobbies,” she said, “<var 1A 02 /var>gobbies<var 1A 01 /var>!”
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_BRAYFLOX_000_017<tab>Yes, gobbies! And gobbies require hand-lending to backstrike at inbreakers. Inbreakers bring bigflock of tinkerdolls to search for watergush!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_018<tab>Watergush... Does Ellerete mean to poison the island's water source!?

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_019<tab>This must be why they were researching the rivers... If the toxins are strong enough, anyone─or anything─that draws near the water would grow terribly ill! All of Vylbrand would fall into disarray!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_BRAYFLOX_000_020<tab>Poisonmakes no good for gobbieflock. No good for Vylbrand! Narrowhearts in need of many punishings!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_021<tab>...This goes far beyond trickery. We must end Ellerete's ambitions here and now!

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_022<tab>I doubt she'll come quietly, and she has the Heartsting at her disposal. But with your aid, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I know we can take it back. As soon as you're ready, we'll storm the Longstop!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_BRAYFLOX_100_023<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Chase narrowheart inbreakers and backtake Longstop!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_100_024<tab>Well...this is it! Ready to storm the Longstop, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_026<tab>There they are!

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ELLERETE_000_027<tab>Oooh, I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> bringing those bits and bobs for battle was a good idea! If you're after some manner of surrender with heartfelt embraces and handing over of magicked heirlooms, you've come to the wrong Longstop, my dear.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_028<tab>You monster... You plan to poison every waterway in Vylbrand, don't you?

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ELLERETE_000_029<tab>But of course! The trick is to let the poison stew for a few bells. With a healthy helping of those tantalizing toxins and a dollop of advanced alchemical processes...poof! This eyesore of an island will get a taste of my finest work yet!

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ELLERETE_000_030<tab>My latest masterpiece neither dissipates nor evaporates, and no amount of inherent immunity can save you from its influence! It may be safe to the touch, but one tiny sip will have you <var 1A 02 /var>begging<var 1A 01 /var> for mercy!

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_KOKONOWA_000_031<tab>That's no jest, by the way. I won't begin to describe what manner of havoc the experimental doses wreaked on me...but I will look forward to seeing how it affects the general populace.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ELLERETE_000_032<tab>Oh, yes! The residents of Limsa Lominsa and its adorable little hamlets rely on this water. So very many people, blissfully unaware of what's to come...
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ELLERETE_000_033<tab>And every single one of those wretches will be at the mercy of our malice... Every! Single! One!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_034<tab>If she unleashes those toxins into the waterways, this is going to end up far worse than Bronze Lake...
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_Q1_100_033<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_A1_100_001<tab>Playtime's over, Ellerete!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_A1_100_002<tab>The only wretches I see here are you two.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ELLERETE_000_035<tab>Your precious scorpion once hunted prey with these poisons, yes? Perhaps I should learn from its example and revel in the thrill of the chase!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_KOKONOWA_000_036<tab>I suspect that's my cue to back away. I'd rather watch the chaos unfold from a safe distance.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ELLERETE_000_037<tab>These venomous gifts keep on giving... My very aether is infused with their essence!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ELLERETE_000_038<tab>So now, my dears...
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ELLERETE_120_038<tab>It's time I hunt <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> for a change!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_KOKONOWA_000_041<tab>Enough, Ellerete! We must escape while we still can─a smoke bomb, quickly!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ELLERETE_000_042<tab>Ugh...fine! Have it your way...
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_KOKONOWA_000_043<tab>W-Wait! That's a goblin-made─
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ELLERETE_000_044<tab>No, no, NOOOOOO! You'll rue the day you made enemies of the Unboooooouuund!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_045<tab>She's left quite the mess behind her. Nothing the Heartsting can't detoxify, though. Let's hurry and clear away the poison.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WHEISKAET_000_046<tab>There you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We came running once we heard the explosion, but I'm pleased to see you're none the worse for wear.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_047<tab>Ellerete and Kokonowa picked up the wrong explosive. We should consider ourselves fortunate that goblin bombs resemble Unbound smoke bombs!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_BRAYFLOX_000_048<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Gobbiebooms and friendlyfaces win the day! Inbreakers go flying skyward!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WHEISKAET_000_049<tab>We made our rounds of the Longstop, as well. The enemy mammets patrolling the place have all gone lifeless.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WHEISKAET_000_050<tab>Your treasure is safe, I trust?
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_052<tab>Yes, thanks to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s support!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WHEISKAET_110_052<tab>Very good. Should those troublemakers survive the impending fall, they won't pose the same threat without it.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WHEISKAET_000_053<tab>If they do happen to show their sorry faces 'round here again, I've notified the Yellowjackets to be on the lookout for them. They send their regards─and their deepest gratitude, of course.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_BRAYFLOX_000_054<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Bigthanks to uplander! Many, many bigthanks!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_056<tab>The Heartsting is safe again... Thank you for everything, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_057<tab>And thank you too, Brayflox! We might not have found Ellerete and Kokonowa without you.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_BRAYFLOX_000_058<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Brayflox happygives hand-lending! Important for all goodgobbies to offer hand-lending to fellow gobbiefriends.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_059<tab>Hee hee! It's an honor to be counted among your gobbiefriends.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_060<tab>Now, as eager as I am to get the Heartsting safely back to Tural, I'd like to say my good-byes to everyone here first, if that's all right.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_061<tab>Wyssulm and Zerig deserve to know how everything transpired in the end, for one thing. Shall we make our way to Aleport?
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_062<tab>I'm relieved our troubles are over, but...I've never been good at farewells.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ZERIG_000_063<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It's good to see you and Miss Loashkana well.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WYSSULM_000_066<tab>Well met, you two! How fares the hunt for Ellerete?
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WYSSULM_000_067<tab>Sent them flying, did you!? Now those are what I call good tidings.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WYSSULM_000_068<tab>To think they'd confuse a goblin explosive for their own smoke bombs... Hah! Serves them right, I say.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ZERIG_000_069<tab>With Miss Loashkana's heirloom returned, we can breathe a collective sigh of relief.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ZERIG_000_070<tab>I, for one, am pleased there will be no more risk of poisoned elixirs... I wouldn't have wished those hiccups on my worst enemy.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WYSSULM_000_071<tab>By the by, Miss Loashkana, I knew you traveled far to get here, but I didn't realize you hailed from Tural! That's quite a voyage... Will you be heading home soon?
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_072<tab>Yes, that's right. Vylbrand is a fascinating place, but my village is probably worried sick about me...and the Heartsting too, of course!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WYSSULM_000_073<tab>Though your time here was short, you'll be sorely missed.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ZERIG_000_074<tab>We still have much to learn, but one day, perhaps we might find our way to Tural as well.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_075<tab>Oh, that would be wonderful! And when you do, I'll look forward to hearing all about your adventures!

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WYSSULM_000_076<tab>And you! We had a feeling you were no ordinary adventurer... Imagine our surprise when we learned you were the savior of the realm <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>!

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WYSSULM_000_077<tab>One of our Yellowjacket acquaintances boasted about meeting the Warrior of Light while investigating the serial poisonings, and that's when it dawned on us... She sends her regards, by the way.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WYSSULM_000_078<tab>We've malms to go before we reach your lofty heights, but gods willing, we'll try to rise to the challenge.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ZERIG_000_079<tab>Indeed. You've given me much to aspire to as a fellow healer, and I shall do my utmost to follow your shining example.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WYSSULM_000_080<tab>Be well, you two, and may we meet again on distant shores!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_081<tab>Thank you both for your help... I'll never forget it.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_082<tab>It's time I returned to Tuliyollal. It would mean the world to me if you'd come too, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I wouldn't want to report our success to Nyipine without you!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_WYSSULM_000_083<tab>Sooner or later, we'll be taking our adventures elsewhere... And when we do, I hope we'll cross paths with you!

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_ZERIG_000_084<tab>You are an inspiration to healers the realm over, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Together with Wyssulm, I hope to dedicate what ability I have to aiding those around me, as you have helped us.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_NYIPINE_000_086<tab>Loashkana! And <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> as well! Your combined presence here can only mean one thing...
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_087<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I have brought the Heartsting home!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_NYIPINE_000_088<tab>So you have, so you have! I regret that I could not assist you, but I am relieved that all is well.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_NYIPINE_000_089<tab>Words cannot express my gratitude to you both.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_090<tab>Taking back the Heartsting was no easy task, but I learned a great deal on my journey to Eorzea.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_091<tab>One of the Unbound─a man called Kokonowa─possessed an inherent immunity to poison, built up by years of regularly ingesting small amounts.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_092<tab>Rather than relying solely on the scorpion's gifts to detoxify us, perhaps we might learn from those traditions and build up a stronger immunity of our own...

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_093<tab>It would be prudent to prepare ourselves in case something like this ever happens again. If we're to continue living among the deadly, perhaps it's time we found new ways to overcome the challenges we face.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_094<tab>Throughout my life in the village, I thought I knew everything there was to know about the Heartsting. But I now understand that the scorpion's gifts can easily become a curse in the wrong hands.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_095<tab>Its power can poison a single water source─threaten countless lives─on a whim!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_096<tab>Yet at the same time, its detoxifying powers can save just as many.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_097<tab>I began to wonder... Could the Heartsting provide succor outside our village? Should it? Or will the risks prove too great?
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_NYIPINE_000_098<tab>Excellent questions, all. Knowing what the Heartsting is capable of outside our borders, we must consider this carefully, for the future of our people.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_NYIPINE_000_099<tab>I am certain your father will wish to speak more of it upon our return.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_100<tab>As you can see, our community has much to consider if we're to keep thriving! But for the moment, I'm simply glad the Heartsting is back in Tural...and I can't thank you enough for your help.

TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_101<tab>Until I met you, I'd never hunted alongside a healer, but knowing I had your support filled me with courage. Yours is a heartening presence─one I'm going to miss dearly!
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_102<tab>You have my gratitude and my trust, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Now and forever.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_103<tab>But as much as I'd like to, I won't keep you any longer. Nyipine and I have a long trek home.
TEXT_KINGBA251_04829_LOASHKANA_000_104<tab>I wish you all the best, and I hope─no, I know─we'll meet again someday!
